description.p: The Honkers Railway Launcher is an unofficial launcher for a certain video game that handles setting up Wine, installing the game, and patching it to work on Linux.

The Honkers Railway Launcher ist ein inoffizieller Launcher für ein bestimmtes Videospiel, welcher die Einrichtung von Wine, die Installation des Spiels und das Patchen, dass es unter Linux läuft, übernimmt.

The Honkers Railway Launcher - это неофициальный лаунчер для определённой видео-игры, который настраивает Wine, устанавливает игру и применяет дополнительные патчи для предоставления возможности её работы на линуксе.
Launcher de un Juego de Anime es un launcher no oficial para cierto videojuego. Se encarga de configurar Wine, instalar el juego, y parchearlo para que funcione en Linux.

The Honkers Railway Launcher è un launcher non ufficiale per un certo videogioco anime che gestisce e configura automaticamente Wine, l'installazione e patching del gioco per farlo funzionare su Linux.

component.description: Az Anime Game Launcher egy nem-hivatalos launcher egy bizonyos videójátékhoz amely helyetted beállítja a Wine-t, telepíti a játékot, és alkalmazza a Linux patch-et hozzá.

description.p: Added new gamescope version compatibility
Added "launcher behavior" option
Added "kill game process" button when chosen behavior keeps launcher window open
Bundled some icons into the app for consistency across the systems
Added better panics handler
Added Swedish
Fixed predownload button sensitivity
Improved pre-downloads state checking
Replaced translation functions by tr! macro
Reworked app resources structure
Added a workaround to remove outdated Telemetry.dll file which fixes login error 400 in game login screen
Fixed jadeite patch state handling from the metadata file
Fixed game pre-downloading button sensitivity when the update was partially downloaded, but then interrupted
Fixed game pre-downloading button visibility when jadeite patch state is not "verified"
Fixed telemetry disabling
Updated translations: Italian, Hungarian, Japanese, Indonesian, Spanish, Turkish, Chinese
Added deletion of old patch files
Added telemetry disabling state support
Added Discord RPC icons updating
Returned back old background file path
See changelog at https://github.com/an-anime-team/the-honkers-railway-launcher/releases/tag/1.2.1
Added Italian and Indonesian
Redesigned main button and added Resume Download as a button option
Added options to use shared libraries from Wine
Added game sessions manager
Initial release
